node.name: Project Set Plugin
node.shortdescription:
This plugin provides support for project sets in eclipse.


Features:


  • full-featured project set editor

  • full compatibility to the eclipse 'Team Project Set' XML file format (*.psf)

  • recursive loading of dependent ProjectSets

  • conflict detection with Tasks and ProblemMarkers

  • support for defining preferred local directories to which the projects are loaded from the repository

  • each user can define values for path variables that can be used for the preferred local directories

  • ProjectSet editor exposes Team menu actions, i.e. for compare/replace etc.

  • ProjectSet editor can be used with and without dedicated ProjectSet project nature

  • leightweight adapter to repository provider via an extension point - no other repository provider dependence

  • adapter to CVS repository provider included

  • adapter to Subversion repository provider available (not included)

  • user documentation as Eclipse help

  • create working set from project set content

  • tested with eclipse 3.1.x and eclipse 3.2.x
node.body:
This plugin provides support for project sets in eclipse.


Features:


  • full-featured project set editor

  • full compatibility to the eclipse 'Team Project Set' XML file format (*.psf)

  • recursive loading of dependent ProjectSets

  • conflict detection with Tasks and ProblemMarkers

  • support for defining preferred local directories to which the projects are loaded from the repository

  • each user can define values for path variables that can be used for the preferred local directories

  • ProjectSet editor exposes Team menu actions, i.e. for compare/replace etc.

  • ProjectSet editor can be used with and without dedicated ProjectSet project nature

  • leightweight adapter to repository provider via an extension point - no other repository provider dependence

  • adapter to CVS repository provider included

  • adapter to Subversion repository provider available (not included)

  • user documentation as Eclipse help

  • create working set from project set content

  • tested with eclipse 3.1.x and eclipse 3.2.x
